alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Trout River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Nassau and northeastern Duval Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arlington, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up 40 to 50 mph. NAS JAX reported a gust to 44 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Unf, Arlington, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Baymeadows, Mayport, Craig Field, San Pablo and Little Talbot Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Trout River
